channel.title: [SRL][RS2]Monastery Terrorist
channel.description:
That's right, the Monastery Terrorist. It will terrorize those silly little monks to no end. And those legit noobs too :D.
Well, I have decided to create another script. At first, this was for my personal use, but I decided to let the people have it (as long as they post bugs/comments/progress reports ;) ;)). It is a really cool script, and although I haven't tested it much, it should work (in theory =P). Let me know how it goes!
[CENTER][b]THE MOST IMPORTANT PART OF THE SCRIPT![/b]
Do NOT forget to handpick the roadcolor (or, color of the monastery floor) on the minimap EVERY time you run this script. If you do not, this script will fail with switching places.[/CENTER]
And now, here's the script! Enjoy, and please post all proggies and bugs, so I may fix them up!

item.title: [SRL][RS2]Monastery Terrorist
item.dc:creator: @X_SilabScape_X X_SilabScape_X
item.description:
@X_SilabScape_X wrote:

Infintry001:

Do NOT forget to handpick the roadcolor (or, color of the monastery floor) on the minimap EVERY time you run this script.

Right im new to this i am extremely basic to this and well how would i hand pick the road colour or what ever…please explain ?

item.description:
@Yaukis wrote:

It is

Line 26: [Error] (58:1): Duplicate identifier 'UpChars' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

Thanks.
